alert.note: Alert for Northern Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 21 at 7:38AM CST until February 23 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Aitkin County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, Big Sandy Lake area. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Forecast snow amounts may still change. Keep up with the latest forecast and adjust travel plans accordingly.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
